events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer role submitted by the candidate and logged it into our applicant tracking system.
The application has been categorized under the engineering department based on the candidateâ€™s experience in software development and devops.
A recruiter experienced in hiring software engineers was assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process to ensure thorough screening.
The candidate was screened on their software engineering background and devops skills, showing strong proficiency in cloud infrastructure.
The candidate responded promptly confirming their availability for the upcoming technical interview that focuses on backend development.
We scheduled the technical interview with the engineering team for the candidate to assess their coding skills and system design knowledge.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and hands-on software development experience.
Following a positive technical interview, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and compensation expectations.
The HR interview was completed successfully; the candidate showed great alignment with company values and communicated clear career goals.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including a competitive compensation package and benefits to join the engineering team.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm to join the software engineering team starting next month.
The candidate formally accepted the offer, confirming their intent to start as a software engineer and contribute to ongoing devops projects.
The onboarding process was initiated with welcome sessions and access setup for the new software engineer joining the team.
The hiring process was successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the software engineering department.
